it.emarolab.owloop.core

Interface Semantic.Ground<O,J>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - the type of ontology in which the axioms will be applied.
    J - the type of instance (i.e.: subject) for the axioms.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Semantic
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MORConcept, MORConcept.Classify<D>, MORConcept.Define, MORConcept.Disjoint<D>, MORConcept.Equivalent<D>, MORConcept.Sub<D>, MORConcept.Super<D>, MORDataProperty, MORDataProperty.Disjoint<D>, MORDataProperty.Domain, MORDataProperty.Equivalent<D>, MORDataProperty.Range, MORDataProperty.Sub<D>, MORDataProperty.Super<D>, MORGrounding<J>, MORIndividual, MORIndividual.DataLink<D>, MORIndividual.Disjoint<D>, MORIndividual.Equivalent<D>, MORIndividual.ObjectLink<D>, MORIndividual.Type<D>, MORObjectProperty, MORObjectProperty.Disjoint<D>, MORObjectProperty.Domain, MORObjectProperty.Equivalent<D>, MORObjectProperty.Inverse<D>, MORObjectProperty.Range, MORObjectProperty.Sub<D>, MORObjectProperty.Super<D>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MORBase, MORClassifyConcept, MORConceptBase, MORDataPropertyBase, MORDefinitionConcept, MORDefinitionDataProperty, MORDefinitionIndividual, MORDefinitionObjectProperty, MORDomainDataProperty, MORDomainObjectProperty, MORFullConcept, MORFullDataProperty, MORFullIndividual, MORFullObjectProperty, MORGrounding.ConceptInstance, MORGrounding.DataInstance, MORGrounding.GroundBase, MORGrounding.IndividualInstance, MORGrounding.ObjectInstance, MORHierarchicalConcept, MORHierarchicalDataProperty, MORHierarchicalObjectProperty, MORIndividualBase, MORLinkIndividual, MORObjectPropertyBase, MORTypeIndividual
    Enclosing interface:
    Semantic

    public static interface Semantic.Ground<O,J>
extends Semantic
    The object for grounding each Semantic.Axioms through a specific Semantic.Descriptor.

    It describes the ontology in which all axioms of a specific Semantic.Axioms will be applied from a Semantic.Descriptor to an instance (i.e.: the subject of the axioms).

    File: it.emarolab.owloop.core.Semantic

    date: 21/05/17

        Describes the ontology in which a Semantic.Descriptor will apply its synchronisations.

        Describes the instances in which a Semantic.Descriptor will apply its synchronisations.
        Returns:

        Perform reasoning among all the ontology described by this object.

      • copyGround

        Semantic.Ground<O,J> copyGround()
        Make a new copyGround of this object. Used to make each Semantic.MappingIntent independent for the evolution of the system. This method should call a specific copyGround constructor.
        Returns:
        a new grounding copyGround.
